CustomField.description: This field will store the error message to be displayed when a portal user is already created and user/agent is still trying to create a portal user via 'Invite Contact to BSP' button on the contact detail page.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will store the error message to be displayed when a portal user is already created and user/agent is still trying to create a portal user via 'Invite Contact to BSP' button on the contact detail page.
CustomField.label: StarTrack Portal User Validation
